snippet: John M. Brickman, formerly of the New York City Board of Correction, and Tobias Winright of Saint Louis University respond to a front-page article.
lead_paragraph: John M. Brickman, formerly of the New York City Board of Correction, and Tobias Winright of Saint Louis University respond to a front-page article.

headline.main: In a Cellblock on Rikers Island: A Portrait of Abuse
headline.print_headline: In a Cellblock on Rikers Island: A Portrait of Abuse
